title: Ep 310: Reservation Dogs, Sterlin Harjo, & The Whole Truth
itunes:title: Ep 310: Reservation Dogs, Sterlin Harjo, & The Whole Truth
description:
Bobby switches to 1000x speed. Sterlin loses his car in the Hollywood Hills. Khalyla flashes an old man. We talk Dr. Kang's sex scene, Meeting Taika Waititi at Sundance, Bill Burr's Okie accent, and the Rose Bowl Pussy Flute. 

Calm is offering a special limited-time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/BELLY

Today Hims is giving you their best offer yet! TigerBelly listeners can get their first visit absolutely free! Go to www.forhhims.com/belly 

Bitcoin. Crypto. NFTs. The financial landscape is harder than ever to navigate, but you don’t have to do it alone. Download and subscribe to Modern Finance wherever you listen to podcasts. That's Modern Finance.
